comment._content: Edith Augusta Gaynor, daughter of New York mayor, William Jay Gaynor, married Harry Vingut in 1910. She divorced him in 1919 and married James Park. New York Times article: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9807E2DE1638E13AB... -- Found in a search. (?)
